description:
A promise is broken and a life is taken.  A man marries a green willow.  The lord of hell is tricked out of his job by a sneaky thief.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The Broken Promise / The Story of the Green Willow / Enma-sama Is Hachigoro-don
Yaburareta Yakusoku / Aoyagi no Hanashi / Enma-sama wa Hachigoro-don
破られた約束 / 青柳のはなし / 閻魔さまはハチコロどん
